string-array.name: sections_specific_notebook
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all sections under a specific notebook
First we get a list of all notebooks and then query for a list of all sections under one of the selected notebooks. Please select a specific notebook from the drop-down below

string-array.name: sections_specific_name
string-array.item: GET: Get sections with a specific name

Query for a list of all sections with a given name. This example shows how to use the \'$filter=name eq \'<term>\' query parameter. Please enter the case-sensitive full section name to look for in the TextBox below

string-array.name: get_all_sections
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all sections
Queries for all sections under all notebooks in OneNote and returns a list

string-array.name: get_metadata_of_section
string-array.item: GET: Get metadata of a specific section
Following the previous example, first we get a list of all sections and then query the metadata for one of the selected sections. Please select a specific section from the drop-down below

string-array.name: create_section
string-array.item: First we get a list of all notebooks and then create a new blank section under one of the selected notebooks. Please select a specific notebook from the drop-down below and also enter the new section\'s name in the TextBox below
